name: Like needed: Platformer
description:
This is a platformer game. You are a little cursor(or hand) who need to find and click on dislike or thumb to rotate it.

If Total Like(Like - Dislike = Total like) is bigger than 0, A go button will appear.


Control:

R to refresh level if you fall or get stuck.

Z, X, ctrl, shift and down arrow to click with your head.

There are seven levels for now.

This is a jam game.
